required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Between WE 941 OD and Brotizolam (Lendormin速) in Healthy Adult Males
clinical_study.official_title: The Bioequivalence Between WE 941 OD Tablets (0.25mg as the Basis) Taken Without Water and Brotizolam Conventional Tablets (Lendormin速 Tablets, 0.25 mg as the Basis) Taken With Water, as a Single Administration in Healthy Adult Male Subjects (Open-labelled, 2-way Cross-over Study)

brief_summary.textblock: The bioequivalence of WE 941 OD tablets prepared in oral disintegrating tablet form taken without water and brotizolam conventional tablets (Lendormin速 tablets) taken with water, was evaluated in healthy adult male subjects (open-labelled, 2-way cross-over study)

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-24h (Area under the plasma concentration-time from 0 to 24 hours)
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hours after drug administration
up to 24 hours after drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hours after drug administration
up to 24 hours after drug administration

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age between 20 and 35 years
- Weight between 50 and 80 kg
- Obesity level within the range of +/- 20% of the standard weight according to the Body Mass Index (BMI) method
- Judged as eligible as a study object following the screening test by the investigator
- Volunteers to participate in the study, who are capable of giving written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to drugs
- History of drug or alcohol abuse
- Received other investigational drug within 4 months of the trial drug administration
- Had > 400 mL of whole blood drawn within 3 months of the trial drug administration
- Had > 400 mL of blood components drawn within 1 month of the trial drug administration
- Used any drug within 10 days of the trial drug administration
- Engaged in strenuous exercise within 5 days of the trial drug administration
- Consumed alcohol within 3 days of the trial drug administration
- Judged as ineligible for the study participation by the investigator for a reason other than above
